title: Endings Guide
content:
. Shadowheart defies him and quickly tells him that he does not belong in the Dark Lady's domain.

In this area, Balthazar has no desire to fight unless you initiate it. He will ask that you follow him as he leads the way into Nightsong's Prison. Your party will be doing a series of jumps until you make it to the bottom of Shadowfell.
